title: When an owner or lessee with prior approval of Municipal Commissioner, develops or constructs the am
clause_text: When an owner or lessee with prior approval of Municipal Commissioner, develops or constructs the amenity on the plot to be surrendered t , at his own cost subject to such stipulations as may be prescribed and to the satisfaction of the Municipal Commissioner and hands over the said developed/constructed amenity along with amenity plot free of cost to the Municipal Commissioner then he may be granted a Transferable Development Rights (TDR ) in the form of FSI as per the following formula:-
section: Transferable Development Rights (TDR ) against Construction of Amenity-
